title: Oculus Chair Premium Leather/Dark Tan
body: In Latin, Oculus means ‘Eye’. Designed in 1960 by Hans Wegner as prototype, it was never manufactured until recently. Mobelaris offers a high end style of the original design featuring the defining eye-shaped seams at the center of the upholstered backrest. This armchair delivers contemporary comfort with a refined sense of style and sophistication. Can be used with the Wingchair Stool for added relaxation.
